title: High-performance thermoelectric composites via scalable and low-cost ink processing
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4560-4568
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00866A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ali Newaz Mohammad Tanvir, Md Omarsany Bappy, Minxiang Zeng, Wenjie Shang, Ke Wang, Kaidong Song, Yukun Liu, Eleonora Isotta, Mercouri G. Kanatzidis, G. Jeffrey Snyder, Alexander W. Dowling, Tengfei Luo, Yanliang Zhang
This work demonstrates a remarkable room-temperature figure of merit zT of 1.3 for BiSbTe-based composites with excellent reproducibility using a scalable, low-cost ink processing technique.
